colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES MTHU STOBS KYI DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE NAG PO CHEN PO GDONG BZHI PA'I TSOGS MCHOD DPAL MGON DGYES PA'I 'DZUM ZHAL, CES BYA BA 'DI YANG BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN 'GRO'I YONGS KYI GTZUG RGYAN KHAL KHA RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG @005A *, ,PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS CHAG SHOG GI LAM NAS BSKUL BA GNANG BA'I BZHED PA BSKONG PHYIR, ,^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS BSTI GNAS DGE 'PHEL BYANG CHUB KYI GLING DU ME STAG BKRA SHIS ZLA BA DRUG PA'I DMAR PHYOGS KYI MKHA' 'GRO 'DU BA'I TSES BZANG POR SBYAR BA'I DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
